name: PayUIndia-NativeOtpAssist
summary: Native OTP Assist SDK for IOS
description: The OTP Assist SDK provides a complete authentication flow for cards transactions. It offers to capture OTP in the merchant app without any redirection to the bankâ€™s 3Dsecure/ACS page. This means that there's one less point of failure in the checkout process and a faster completion rate for transactions.
